info.title: Dina api
info.description:
This is a first draft of dina api documentation. It can either be viewed as an
[Open api spec](https://alpha-api-docs.dina-web.net/?url=https://alpha-api-docs.dina-web.net/openApi.json&docExpansion=false&defaultModelRendering=model&defaultModelExpandDepth=0)
or as a
[Swagger spec](https://alpha-api-docs.dina-web.net/?url=https://alpha-api-docs.dina-web.net/swagger.json&docExpansion=false&defaultModelRendering=model&defaultModelExpandDepth=0)

Descriptions like below can be written in markdown:

* [Dina web](https://alpha-cm.dina-web.net/login)
* [Dina web with mocks](https://alpha-cm-mock.dina-web.net/login)
* [Dina style guilde](https://alpha-style.dina-web.net)
info.x-versionInfo: # This is some version specific information

data.description: Should have a one of condition

identificationText.example: Sorex minutus, by Doe, J. on 1982-01-01

identifiedAsVerbatim.description: In exactly the same words as were used originally

individualGroup.description: # This is a description in a markdown file

coordinatesVerbatim.description: Verbatim coordinates (or corresponding information, e.g. map number) from the original source

georeferenceSourcesText.description: Describe how you got the georeferenced coordinates (data source(s), tools, maps ...)

localityVerbatim.description: Verbatim locality names and description, as in the original source, typos and all.

localityInformation.description:
# localityInformation

Contains information related to where an occurrence happened.

polygon.description: A polygon with longitude, latitude vertices

vertices.description: Corners of the polygon in sane format

position.description: A position represent a specific position

latitude.description: Latitude or northing. Use negative number or letter S for coordinates on southern hemisphere.

longitude.description: Latitude or easting. Use negative number or letter W for coordinates on western hemisphere.

createdBy.description: Some kind of reference to the individual that created the locality

updatedBy.description: Some kind of reference to the individual that updated/created the specific version

updatedAt.description: Timestamp corresponding to when updated. Could be called versionCreatedAt

id.description: Unique identifier that is consistent over time

rubin_number.description: Rubin storage number for the taxon

scientific_name.description: Taxon scientific name, binomial if species

items.description: Vernacular (common) English names for the taxon

synonyms.description: List of synonyms as free-form text

sort_order.description: Taxonomical sort order code from Mammal Species of the World list

get.summary: Get a batch update item by itemId

put.summary: Get a batch update by id

get.summary: Get a batch update by id

post.description:
This endpoint is for the moment used to register mammals in the mammal
registration form
post.summary: Create an individual group and a catalogUnit if not existing

get.description:
Makes it possible to fetch an individualGroup based on
catalogedUnit.catalogNumber OR identification.identifiedTaxonNameStandardized

More information to come

parameters.description: catalog number used to filter individualGroups
parameters.name: filter[catalogNumber]

parameters.description: Standardized taxon name used to filter individualGroups
parameters.name: filter[identifiedTaxonNameStandardized]

parameters.description: sub models to include in a comma separated list
parameters.name: include

get.summary: Find latest version of a curatedLocality
Find latest version of a curatedLocality

patch.description: This endpoint is for the moment used to edit mammals in the mammal specimen form
patch.summary: Update an individual group by id

get.description: Fetches a taxon or several taxa.

parameters.description: Taxon name - accepted scientific, synonym or vernacular name
parameters.name: filter[name]
